works.description:
All these posts were from a blog I just  

shutdown.  This blog's links have been saved but the blog was started in  

2010.  Your author of this ENTIRE blog has STOLEN content from mine,  
passing it off as his own.   All posts and images are property of  
TheWeatherSpace.com.

What is a satire blog was meant to stay on the site.  Blogger is in  
violation of copyright by allowing the author to continue to copy posts  
made from TheWeatherSpace.com's servers.

As you can see the dates are different.  Since I decided to shut the blog 

down due to this person copying ... I want you to remove this blog and  
author due to copyright violation of my posts on the three surviving links
 
above.
